mapper.select: SELECT toubaoriqi time , count(baoxiandanhao) value FROM insurance_record where toubaoriqi >= #{param1,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and toubaoriqi <= #{param2,jdbcType=VARCHAR} group by toubaoriqi order by toubaoriqi
SELECT count(distinct t.toubaorenshenfenzhenghao) FROM insurance_record t

SELECT id , baoxiandanhao , toubaodanhao , yewuyuandaima , yewuyuanxingming , xianzhongmingcheng , baodanzhuangtai , toubaoriqi , shengxiaoriqi , jibenbaoe , jibenbaofei , toubaorenxingming , toubaorenxingbie , toubaorenshenfenzhenghao , toubaorenshoujihao , toubaorentongxundizhi , toubaorenzhiye , beibaoxianrenxingming , beibaoxianrenxingbie , beibaoxianrenshenfenzhenghao , beibaoxianrenshoujihao , beibaoxianrentongxundizhi , beibaoxianrenzhiye , beibaoxianrenyutoubaorenguanxi , shouyirenxingming , shouyirenxingbie , shouyirenshenfenzhenghao , shouyishunxu , shouyifene , shouyirenyutoubaorenguanxi , jiaofeiqi , baoxianqi , jiaofeiyinhang , jiaofeizhanghao , chushilaiyuan , jigouhao , xianzhongdaima , qudao , zhihang , wangdian , dianhua , chushengriqi , bumengjingli , yuanzhuanguanyuangonghao , yuanzhuanguanyuan , xinfenpeirenyuangonghao , xinfenpeirenyuan , fafangshijian , fafangbiaoshi , beizhu , kaituoxindan , tousujilu FROM insurance_record t WHERE id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
